::Astral/Zardus::

Astral turns another corner, stopping when he sees Zardus approaching. 
They were both heading for the bridge and had nearly run into each 
other.

"Hello, sir," he says, saluting, "We picked up a new bot. Meet 
Composer."

Astral steps aside, gesturing toward Composer. Zardus nods and 
approaches the bot.

"Welcome to the Alliance. I am Commander Zardus," he says, looking the 
bot over and judging what use he'd be to the Alliance. The orb in his 
palm was twinkling again, but whether it was its own energy or the 
reflection of the lights was unknown.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>       Composer didn't say much, he just followed Astral.  But he 
thought.
> He thought.  Where......Where could his brothers be?  Well, if he 
were to
> find them, they could join the Alliance, and they could live happy
